name: renumber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give something a different number in a series and usually to write this new number on it: The author renumbered the pages of the manuscript. The school officials decided to renumber the classrooms to make it easier for new students to find their way around. She had to re-number the tables in the document and alter all of the references to them.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no need to renumber every page as the computer will do that automatically. He deleted paragraph 5 and renumbered the remaining paragraphs.
